title: Fredericksburg & Spotsylvania National Military Park: Photo Gallery
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     Photo Gallery              Photo Gallery          Â                 Fredericksburg Battlefield   19 Photos  Photos of the landscape and terrain on the Fredericksburg battlefield          Fredericksburg Monuments   32 Photos  Photos and information about monuments on the Fredericksburg battlefield          Chatham Manor   17 Photos  Photos of historic Chatham Manor, a private residence for over 200 years. The house was used as a Union headquarters and field hospital during the Battle of Fredericksburg.             Chancellorsville Battlefield   21 Photos  Photos of the landscape and terrain on the Chancellorsville battlefield           Chancellorsville Monuments   12 Photos  Photos and information about monuments on the Chancellorsville battlefield           Salem Church   5 Photos  Photos of historic Old Salem Church             Salem Church Monuments   4 Photos  Photos and information about monuments on the Salem Church battlefield          Wilderness Battlefield   18 Photos  Photos of the landscape and terrain on the Wilderness battlefield           Wilderness Monuments   14 Photos  Photos and information about monuments on the Wilderness battlefield             Ellwood   13 Photos  Photos of historic Ellwood, a plantation which served as a headquarters for the Union army during the Battle of the Wilderness. Stonewall Jackson's arm is also buried on the property.                Prev    1   2   3   of 3  Next
